asexual.content:
Should I really do an #introduction ? I’m already loud and obnoxious… I’ll follow etiquette though.

I’m Lesley, in Chicago. I have been doing #infosec for quite a while now. I focus on #dfir for #ics and critical infrastructure. I manage a team of incident responders. I do a lot of talks and career clinics and writing about that - links in profile. I want to talk at your con. ✨

Outside work I do lots of stuff. I’m really into #martialarts even though I’ll never be super good. I have two third degree black belts in #TangSooDo and #taekwondo. Big test next year for 4th Dan. I also study #arnis and Kung Fu. I coach middle schoolers. I also love #gaming, especially a #mmorpg. I watch lots of geeky movies and #cosplay at cons even though I’m ancient. I’m a goof. I also shoot #bows and #pistols competitively. I love a good gin martini. I can chat about almost anything.

I retired from the #USAF reserves in 2021 after an interesting career seeing a lot of the world.

I am publicly 🏳️‍🌈 #non-binary and #asexual. I prefer they/them pronouns for that reason, but I don’t get upset when people accidentally mess it up. Gender is silly, and I prefer to not participate in gender roles! I never married or had kids for that reason, but people are great and I have lots of awesome pals to have adventures with. 🤷🏻‍♀️🍸

I care deeply about #humanrights and #socialjustice. I am a proud #atheist and #humanist. It’s integral to who I am. I care about people today and future generations being well and safe. I’ll get mad for you, because I care.

The Drag Queen's hair is coifed up with curls framing her face and a lovely shade of pale pink. Her make up is dramatic in gold and purple and she has ruby slipper earrings. Her gown is shades of purple, grey and white and she wears a purple headdress covered in pearls and with grey and black stripes and an Ace of Spaces symbol dangling over her forehead. The lace of her ruff also features the Ace of Spades. Her gown is embroidered in purple violets, and her purple silk drape contains a pattern made up of a heavily made up eye, the rocky horror lips, and a camera symbol. Around her neck she wears a bejeweled trans symbol with a sparkling pink triangle in the middle. A kinky boot hangs off one side of her ruff. She wears a gauzy cape edged in a lace design of back to back crescent moons and a lambada symbol and on her left arm is a large decorative chamelion striped in rainbow, it's tongue holds a little heart. Her right hand is held aloft holding a rainbow. The words "Ego sum qui sum" are painted in gold to one side of the piece. I am who I am.

cw.content:
The big difference I see between #mastodon and #birdsite is the interaction between culture and technology.

There is currently a debate about #cw's and how they should be used. This is valid and expectations differ for valid reasons.

However, there are also possible ways that tech can help, for instance:

• could users or instances specific default CWs
• could we opt out / in to these

The tech and social practice can evolve together if we wish [1/2].

account.note: I work @openrightsgroup

cw.content:
@FiXato CWs are not subjects

On instances that support it (#GlitchSoc among them), there's Markdown, which supports bold, emphasis, and other elements.

Including subject headers

Subjects reveal. CWs conceal.

Incidentally, the source code reveals that CWs are intended as spoiler warnings. The evolved usage differs from that. @Gargron has stated previously that his regret is making CWs inherited on replies. I've noted numerous times that CWs are a major impediment to reading threads for non-Mastodon users, in which EVERY SINGLE TOOT MUST BE INDIVIDUALLY EXPANDED ONE BY ONE WITH A MIS_CLICK REQUIRING STARTING OVER FROM ONE.

I've noted this for years. The behaviour could be fixed fairly trivially (default a directly-visited thread to non-CW'd / open, OR offer an open all button on that page. Neither exist.

@TheGibson @aendra

#cw #uiux #MastoDev

VerseThursday.content:
**Relenting**

I should have told her then,
but I was unsure.
When love needs another
it's timid and can't speak.

When it's lost
it thinks
of how far away
home has become
and regrets adventure.

The worst is when
love becomes
forgetful
and misses the memories
that surely must have been.

Stern justice
for my neglect:
that I must
sit here quietly,
missing the love itself.

-- Saineolai

#VerseThursday #poetry #poem

VerseThursday.content:
Locked up and wrestling,
we
the collective all
passed our aggressions
our needs,
tongue-tied to every second.

How we battered one another!
Thrown tight-bound fists
taped shut
in lockstep series against
her fixed ticking methods.

No chance passed
as no moment missed
to aggreive what was ours.
It always was, and more;
that burden
we placed atop the hill.

In time,
our common enemy,
our fists drew back.
We struck as she did;
The clock opened, and time kissed back.

#VerseThursday

VerseThursday.content:
Late in the yellow morning
after rubble and scree have flown
the rock rests downhill in dust
a weightless dash to follow
the aching freedom of speed and muscle
and sweat cold in a rush
Sisyphus must again
wrestle his grey burdens up
strong with anticipation of one moment of lightness
after the fall of the stone

#VerseThursday

#VerseThursday
What still alive at twenty-two,
A clean, upstanding chap like you?
Sure, if your throat ’tis hard to slit,
Slit your girl’s, and swing for it.
Like enough, you won’t be glad
When they come to hang you, lad:
But bacon’s not the only thing
That’s cured by hanging from a string.
So, when the spilt ink of the night
Spreads o’er the blotting-pad of light,
Lads whose job is still to do
Shall whet their knives, and think of you.

-A. E. Housman

It was beautiful:
I wanted to remember
for always that
you laughed
until we both cried.

I got my wish,
sobbing my makeup off
alone, and scared
I had hurt you
with my shine.

Would the sun cry
if it knew
it chased away
the stars
every night?

#VerseThursday

fracking.content:
Gefährliche Idee

Fracking ist in Deutschland verboten. Eigentlich. Christian Lindner will das nun ändern. Dabei schadet das riskante Gasbohren dem Klima und kann das Grundwasser verseuchen. Mit einem großen Appell zeigen wir dem Finanzminister, dass die Menschen im Land seine gefährliche Idee nicht mittragen. Sei auch Du dabei: Fracking muss verboten bleiben!
#fracking #klimawandel #klimaschutz

neverforget.content: »That fascism lives on, that the oft-invoked working through of the past has to this day been unsuccessful and has degenerated into its own caricature, an empty and cold forgetting, is due to the fact that the objective conditions of society that engendered fascism continue to exist. Fascism essentially cannot be derived from subjective dispositions. The economic order, and to a great extent also the economic organization modeled upon it, now as then renders the majority of people dependent upon conditions beyond their control and thus maintains them in a state of political immaturity. If they want to live, then no other avenue remains but to adapt, submit themselves to the given conditions; they must negate precisely that autonomous subjectivity to which the idea of democracy appeals; they can preserve themselves only if they renounce their self. To see through the nexus of deception, they would need to make precisely that painful intellectual effort that the organization of everyday life, and not least of all a culture industry inflated to the point of totality, prevents. The necessity of such adaptation, of identification with the given, the status quo, with power as such, creates the potential for totalitarianism.« (Theodor W. Adorno, The Meaning of Working Through the Past, 1959) #neverforget #weremember

project.content:
I wrapped up a #project to re-package my garage-door-latch monitor. It's a commercial device that I've #hacked to change the magnetic reed switch to a precisely positioned micro-switch. I also removed the coin cell holder and fabricated a CR123 holder cavity which has way more capacity.

Much #blender design and #3Dprinting involved, but now I don't need to change the battery in the dead of winter every year, I hope.

media_attachments.description:
Oder wie es der liebe
Stephen Hawking ausgedrückt hat:
„I’ve recorded a number of
messages about the
#GlobalGoals which have been
sent out today. You may have
seen some of them being
tweeted, but this one is for all of
you.
We want to be the first generation
to end extreme poverty – the
most determined generation to
fight injustice and inequality –
and the last generation to be
threatened by climate change.
Please join us by sharing this film
and telling everyone.“ -SH
Wir werden immer mehr Menschen sein, die sehen und spüren wie uns alle das
„System Prohibition“ verletzt und schädigt. Wir vernetzen uns zunehmend.
Wir finden gute Lösungen.
Wir lassen uns immer weniger teilen und aufeinander hetzen.Wir sind Menschen: Eltern, Kinder, Opa, Oma, Onkel, Tante, Nachbar, Freunde,
… einfach nur MENSCHEN und sonst NICHTS.
Wir wollen gesund und in Würde und in Frieden mit dem Hanf leben. Weltweit.
Nicht mehr und nicht weniger.
[…]
Wir, als DIE HANFINITIATIVE, wollen, dass wir und unsere Kinder und Enkel eine
lebenswerte und gesunde Gegenwart und Zukunft erleben und erwarten
dürfen.
Wir sind deshalb vielseitig aktiv und recherchieren auch Fakten und stellen
diese zur Debatte.
Wir vertreten auch unsere eigenen Wertvorstellungen, Meinungen, Emotionen
und Erkenntnisse.
Bitte prüfen Sie unsere Fakten und Schlussfolgerungen und ziehen Sie ihre
eigenen Schlüsse, wenn Sie sich umfangreich informiert haben.
 :-) :-) :-) Lieben Dank wir lieben EUCH!!! Immer!

\ud23f\uce5c\uc18c.content:
이제와서 쓰는 #툿친소 해시태그 빌려서 자기소개 겸 하고 싶은 말

뭐.. 큐돈 설립자구요, 사람들이 이렇게 모여서 건강한 커뮤니티가 되었다는 것에 참 감사해요
큐돈은 제가 :bluebird_freeze:​ 사이트에서 울면서 뛰쳐나와 만들었습니다. 그래서 큐돈 설립기념일이 저에게는 트라우마이기도 한 날이에요

큐돈도 5년 넘게 운영 중이고 마스토돈 개발에도 어느 정도 참여하고 있습니다. 마스토돈 버그 발견하면 제가 고치기도 합니다.
마스토돈 한국어 번역도 거의 다 제가 합니다. 공앱 번역도 해놨어요 (iOS는 기다려주세요, 하고 있습니다)

요즘 예상치 못한 사용자 증가로 서버가 힘들어 하네요. 관리자인 저와 중재자 분들이 매우 힘써주시고 계십니다.
큐돈은 후원도 받고 있으니 금전으로 응원하고 싶으신 분들은 참고해 주세요

Since #throwbackthursday is a thing right now here's Dewblit!

It's a drippy lil rhythm game with branching paths where the music/rhythms change based on which lily-pad you chose :)

It's Groundwater's first ever game and was made for the Portland Indie Gaming Squad's Summer Slow Jam back in 2020.

If you're curious you can play it on @itchio ♡♡
https://groundwater.itch.io/dewblit

throwbackthursday.content:
#ThrowbackThursday a now/then of this spot in #Vancouver’s Stanley Park.

There was a zoo in the park from the late 1800s up until 1997. Hard to believe this was the polar bear habitat 😔 or that we still had a zoo in the park until the late nineties.

First photo by me, last week. Other photo from 1963 is from the City of Vancouver Archives.
